description: '''Huỳnh Minh Hưng,''' commonly known by his stage name '''Đàm Vĩnh Hưng''' (born 2 October 1971{{citation needed|date=March 2011}}), often referred to by his nickname '''Mr. Dam''',{{citation needed|date=February 2022}} is a Vietnamese singer. He won 2 Dedication awards and multiple awards in Vietnam. Besides V-pop, he also performed many pre-war songs, [[Trịnh Công Sơn|Trinh Cong Son]]'s songs and [[yellow music]]. He is one of the most highly paid singers in Vietnam and some of his alleged statements have appeared in tabloids.
